00051 LocalBroker::LocalBroker(PropertiesPtr &cfg) {
00052   m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("verbose");
00053 
00057   Path root = cfg->get_str("root", "");
00058 
00059   if (!root.is_complete())
00060     root = Path(System::install_dir) / root;
00061 
00062   m_rootdir = root.directory_string();
00063 
00064   // ensure that root directory exists
00065   if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_rootdir))
00066     exit(1);
00067 }

00075 void
00076 LocalBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00077   int fd, local_fd;
00078   String abspath;
00079 
00080   HT_DEBUGF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00081 
00082   if (fname[0] == '/')
00083     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00084   else
00085     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00086 
00087   fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_fd);
00088 
00092   if ((local_fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) == -1) {
00093     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00094     report_error(cb);
00095     return;
00096   }
00097 
00098   {
00099     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00100     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(local_fd, O_RDONLY));
00101 
00102     cb->get_address(addr);
00103 
00104     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00105 
00106     cb->response(fd);
00107   }
00108 }

00111 void
00112 LocalBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname, bool overwrite,
00113                     int32_t bufsz, int16_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00114   int fd, local_fd;
00115   int flags;
00116   String abspath;
00117 
00118   HT_DEBUGF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%lld",
00119             fname, (int)overwrite, bufsz, (int)replication, (Lld)blksz);
00120 
00121   if (fname[0] == '/')
00122     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00123   else
00124     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00125 
00126   fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_fd);
00127 
00128   if (overwrite)
00129     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00130   else
00131     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00132 
00136   if ((local_fd = ::open(abspath.c_str(), flags, 0644)) == -1) {
00137     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00138     report_error(cb);
00139     return;
00140   }
00141   HT_DEBUGF("created file='%s' fd=%d local_fd=%d", fname, fd, local_fd);
00142 
00143   {
00144     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00145     OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataLocal(local_fd, O_WRONLY));
00146 
00147     cb->get_address(addr);
00148 
00149     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00150 
00151     cb->response(fd);
00152   }
00153 }

00156 void LocalBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00157   HT_DEBUGF("close fd=%d", fd);
00158   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00159   cb->response_ok();
00160 }

00163 void LocalBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00164   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00165   ssize_t nread;
00166   uint64_t offset;
00167   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00168 
00169   HT_DEBUGF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00170 
00171   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00172     char errbuf[32];
00173     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00174     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00175     HT_ERRORF("bad file handle: %d", fd);
00176     return;
00177   }
00178 
00179   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00180     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd,
00181               strerror(errno));
00182     report_error(cb);
00183     return;
00184   }
00185 
00186   if ((nread = FileUtils::read(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount)) == -1) {
00187     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00188               strerror(errno));
00189     report_error(cb);
00190     return;
00191   }
00192 
00193   buf.size = nread;
00194 
00195   cb->response(offset, buf);
00196 }

00199 void LocalBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd,
00200                          uint32_t amount, const void *data, bool sync) {
00201   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00202   ssize_t nwritten;
00203   uint64_t offset;
00204 
00205   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"append fd="<< fd <<" amount="<< amount <<" data='"
00206       << format_bytes(20, data, amount) <<" sync="<< sync << HT_END;
00207 
00208   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00209     char errbuf[32];
00210     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00211     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00212     return;
00213   }
00214 
00215   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, 0, SEEK_CUR)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00216     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=0 SEEK_CUR - %s", fdata->fd,
00217               strerror(errno));
00218     report_error(cb);
00219     return;
00220   }
00221 
00222   if ((nwritten = FileUtils::write(fdata->fd, data, amount)) == -1) {
00223     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00224               strerror(errno));
00225     report_error(cb);
00226     return;
00227   }
00228 
00229   if (sync && fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00230     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00231     report_error(cb);
00232     return;
00233   }
00234 
00235   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00236 }

00239 void LocalBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00240   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00241 
00242   HT_DEBUGF("seek fd=%lu offset=%llu", (Lu)fd, (Llu)offset);
00243 
00244   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00245     char errbuf[32];
00246     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00247     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00248     return;
00249   }
00250 
00251   if ((offset = (uint64_t)lseek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00252     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%llu - %s", fdata->fd, (Llu)offset,
00253               strerror(errno));
00254     report_error(cb);
00255     return;
00256   }
00257 
00258   cb->response_ok();
00259 }

00265   HT_DEBUGF("remove file='%s'", fname);

00271

00274               strerror(errno));

00276     return;

00283 void LocalBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fname) {
00284   String abspath;
00285   uint64_t length;
00286 
00287   HT_DEBUGF("length file='%s'", fname);
00288 
00289   if (fname[0] == '/')
00290     abspath = m_rootdir + fname;
00291   else
00292     abspath = m_rootdir + "/" + fname;
00293 
00294   if ((length = FileUtils::length(abspath)) == (uint64_t)-1) {
00295     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(),
00296               strerror(errno));
00297     report_error(cb);
00298     return;
00299   }
00300

00305 void
00306 LocalBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00307                    uint32_t amount) {
00308   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00309   ssize_t nread;
00310   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00311 
00312   HT_DEBUGF("pread fd=%d offset=%llu amount=%d", fd, (Llu)offset, amount);
00313 
00314   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00315     char errbuf[32];
00316     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00317     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00318     return;
00319   }
00320 
00321   if ((nread = FileUtils::pread(fdata->fd, buf.base, amount, (off_t)offset))
00322       == -1) {
00323     HT_ERRORF("pread failed: fd=%d amount=%d offset=%llu - %s", fdata->fd,
00324               amount, (Llu)offset, strerror(errno));
00325     report_error(cb);
00326     return;
00327   }
00328 
00329   buf.size = nread;
00330 
00331   cb->response(offset, buf);
00332 }

00344

00346     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(),
00347               strerror(errno));
00348     report_error(cb);
00349     return;
00350   }
00351 
00352   cb->response_ok();

00387 void LocalBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00388   std::vector<String> listing;
00389   String absdir;
00390 
00391   HT_DEBUGF("Readdir dir='%s'", dname);
00392 
00393   if (dname[0] == '/')
00394     absdir = m_rootdir + dname;
00395   else
00396     absdir = m_rootdir + "/" + dname;
00397 
00398   DIR *dirp = opendir(absdir.c_str());
00399   if (dirp == 0) {
00400     HT_ERRORF("opendir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00401     report_error(cb);
00402     return;
00403   }
00404 
00405   struct dirent dent;
00406   struct dirent *dp;
00407 
00408   if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00409     HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00410     (void)closedir(dirp);
00411     report_error(cb);
00412     return;
00413   }
00414 
00415   while (dp != 0) {
00416     if (dp->d_name[0] != '.' && dp->d_name[0] != 0)
00417       listing.push_back((String)dp->d_name);
00418 
00419     if (readdir_r(dirp, &dent, &dp) != 0) {
00420       HT_ERRORF("readdir('%s') failed - %s", absdir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00421       report_error(cb);
00422       return;
00423     }
00424   }
00425   (void)closedir(dirp);
00426 
00427   HT_DEBUGF("Sending back %d listings", (int)listing.size());
00428 
00429   cb->response(listing);
00430 }

00433 void LocalBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00434   OpenFileDataLocalPtr fdata;
00435 
00436   HT_DEBUGF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00437 
00438   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00439     char errbuf[32];
00440     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00441     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00442     return;
00443   }
00444 
00445   if (fsync(fdata->fd) != 0) {
00446     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, strerror(errno));
00447     report_error(cb);
00448     return;
00449   }
00450 
00451   cb->response_ok();
00452 }

00460 void LocalBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00461   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00462   cb->response_ok();
00463   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00464 }

00481 void
00482 LocalBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00483   String asrc =
00484     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00485   String adst =
00486     format("%s%s%s", m_rootdir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00487 
00488   HT_DEBUGF("rename %s -> %s", asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str());
00489 
00490   if (std::rename(asrc.c_str(), adst.c_str()) != 0) {
00491     report_error(cb);
00492     return;
00493   }
00494   cb->response_ok();
00495 }

00501   cb->error(Error::NOT_IMPLEMENTED, format("Unsupported debug command - %d",
00502             command));

00506 
00507 void LocalBroker::report_error(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00508   char errbuf[128];
00509   errbuf[0] = 0;
00510 
00511   strerror_r(errno, errbuf, 128);
00512 
00513   if (errno == ENOTDIR || errno == ENAMETOOLONG || errno == ENOENT)
00514     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf);
00515   else if (errno == EACCES || errno == EPERM)
00516     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf);
00517   else if (errno == EBADF)
00518     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00519   else if (errno == EINVAL)
00520     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf);
00521   else
00522     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf);
00523 }
